biography.bio: Anna Arlanova was born on February 28, 1979 in Moscow, USSR. She is an actress and writer, known for Moskovskye okna (2001), The Story of M. (2013) and -196 (2014).
biography.name: Anna Arlanova

biography.placeOfBirth: Gorkiy, Gorkovskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR [now Nizhniy Novgorod, Nizhegorodskaya oblast, Russia]
biography.bio: Andrey Ilin was born on June 18, 1960 in Gorkiy, Gorkovskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR as Andrey Epifanovich Ilin. He is known for his work on Kakaya chudnaya igra (1995), Krasnaya kapella (2004) and Ankor, eshchyo ankor! (1993). He is married to Inga Rutkevich. They have one child. He was previously married to Aleksandra Tabakova and Lyudmila Voroshilova.
biography.name: Andrey Ilin

biography.bio: Anastasiya Lapina was born on June 20, 1978. She is an actress, known for The First Circle (2006), Pal/Secam (2008) and Kovcheg (2002).
biography.name: Anastasiya Lapina

biography.bio: Aleksandr Mokhov was born on June 22, 1963 as Aleksandr Anatolyevich Mokhov. He is an actor and director, known for Le barbier de Sibérie (1998), Bespredel (1989) and Bratany (2009).
biography.name: Aleksandr Mokhov

biography.bio: Aleksandr Pashutin was born on January 28, 1943 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Aleksandr Sergeyevich Pashutin. He is an actor, known for Plyumbum, ili Opasnaya igra (1987), Parade of the Planets (1984) and Vezuchiy chelovek (1987).
biography.name: Aleksandr Pashutin

biography.bio: Karina Razumovskaya was born in St.Petersburg, Russia (ex Leningrad, USSR). Karina had her first taste of filming at age 5 when she joined the 'Tormozhenie v nebesakh' movie for an episode. Later, she began her professional training as a student at St.Petersburg State Theatre Arts Academy. Graduating in 2004, Karina became a member of the troupe at the Russian State Academic Tovstonogov Bolshoi Drama Theater.
biography.name: Karina Razumovskaya

biography.bio: Sergey Shekhovtsov is an actor, known for Coeur de pierre (2007), Lucky Trouble (2011) and Po pryamoy (1992).
biography.name: Sergey Shekhovtsov

biography.placeOfBirth: Novosibirsk, Novosibirskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR [now Russia]
biography.bio: Elena Shevchenko was born on October 23, 1964 in Novosibirsk, Novosibirskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR as Elena Pavlovna Shevchenko. She is an actress, known for Sympathy Seeker (1997), Dve luny, tri solntsa (1998) and Noktyurn dlya barabana i mototsikla (1994). She is married to Igor Lebedev. They have two children. She was previously married to Vladimir Mashkov.
biography.name: Elena Shevchenko

biography.bio: Anna Shtukaturova was born on February 11, 1988. She is an actress, known for The Thief (1997), Zimniy roman (2004) and What Men Talk About (2010).
biography.name: Anna Shtukaturova

biography.placeOfBirth: Leningrad, RSFSR, USSR [now St. Petersburg, Russia]
biography.bio: Evgeniy Sidikhin was born on October 2, 1964 in Leningrad, RSFSR, USSR as Evgeniy Vladimirovich Sidikhin. He is an actor, known for The Downfall of Berlin: Anonyma (2008), L'été de mes 27 baisers (2000) and Les enfants des dieux de la fonte (1993).
biography.name: Evgeniy Sidikhin

biography.bio: Kirill Sinitsyn is an actor, known for Kovcheg (2002).
biography.name: Kirill Sinitsyn
